protocol.name: P-G18112-1
protocol.text: Long day regime (~16h of light & 8h of dark), grown in greenhouse, ~23 degree.

protocol.name: P-G18112-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated as previously described  in Ruuska and Ohlrogge, 2001 and was treated with DNAase RQ-1 (Promega) then RNA was amplified using 2-cycle Affimetrix labelling using the standard Affymetrix protocol
